# authorizationStatus(for:)

**Type Method**

Returns the app’s authorization to access the user’s photo library for the specified access level.

## Declaration

```swift
class func authorizationStatus(for accessLevel: PHAccessLevel) -> PHAuthorizationStatus
```

## Parameters

- **accessLevel**: The access level for which to determine the app’s authorization status.

## Return Value

The app’s authorization status.

## Discussion

For more information about accessing the user’s Photos library, see [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotoKit/delivering-an-enhanced-privacy-experience-in-your-photos-app].

## Verifying Authorization

- **requestAuthorization(for:handler:)**: Prompts the user to grant the app permission to access the photo library.
- **PHAccessLevel**: The app’s level of access to the user’s photo library.
- **PHAuthorizationStatus**: Information about your app’s authorization to access the user’s photo library.
- **authorizationStatus()**: Returns information about your app’s authorization to access the user’s photo library.
- **requestAuthorization(_:)**: Requests the user’s permission, if needed, to access the photo library.
